00002 class OsimoTheme extends OsimoModule{
00003  public $page_type;
00004  protected $theme,$title;
00005  private $theme_path,$cache_file,$view;
00006  private $css,$js;
00007  public $classes;

00009  function OsimoTheme($options=false){
00010   parent::OsimoModule();
00011   $this->defaults = array(
00012    "theme"=>"default",
00013    "title"=>"Osimo Forum System"
00014   );
00015   
00016   $this->parseOptions($options);
00017   $this->init();
00018  }
00019  
00020  private function init(){
00021   $this->css = array();
00022   $this->js = array();
00023   
00024   $this->theme_path = ABS_THEMES.$this->theme.'/';
00025   define('ABS_THEME',$this->theme_path);
00026   define('URL_THEME',URL_THEMES.$this->theme.'/');
00027   
00028   $this->addJavascript(SITE_URL.'os-includes/js/jquery.js');
00029   $this->addJavascript(SITE_URL.'os-includes/js/jquery-ui.js');
00030   $this->addJavascript(SITE_URL.'os_includes/js/osimo_editor/osimo_editor.js');
00031  }

00033  public function setTitle($title){
00034   $this->title = $title;
00035  }
00036  
00037  public function getTitle(){
00038   if(!isset($this->title)){
00039    $this->autoTitle();
00040   }
00041   
00042   return $this->title;
00043  }
00044  
00045  public function autoTitle(){
00046   if($this->page_type == 'index'){
00047    $this->setTitle(OS_SITE_TITLE);
00048   }
00049   elseif($this->page_type == 'forum'){
00050    $this->setTitle(OS_SITE_TITLE);
00051   }
00052  }
00053  
00054  public function addStylesheet($url){
00055   if(!in_array($url,$this->css)){
00056    $this->css[] = $url;
00057   }
00058  }
00059  
00060  public function addJavascript($url){
00061   if(!in_array($url,$this->js)){
00062    $this->js[] = $url;
00063   }
00064  }
00065  
00066  public function get_header($echo = true){
00067   $html = "<title>".$this->title." - Powered by Osimo</title>\n";
00068   foreach($this->js as $js){
00069    $html .= "<script src=\"".$js."\"></script>\n";
00070   }
00071   foreach($this->css as $css){
00072    $html .= "<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"".$css."\" type=\"text/css\" media=\"screen\" />\n";
00073   }
00074 
00075   if($echo){ echo $html; }
00076   return $html;
00077  }

00079  public function setPageType($type){
00080   $this->page_type = strtolower(str_replace(" ","_",$type));
00081  }

00083  private function autoSetPageType($page){
00084   $page = strtolower(str_replace(" ","_",$page));
00085   $types = array(
00086    'index','forum',
00087    'thread','profile'
00088   );
00089   
00090   if(in_array($page,$types)){
00091    $this->page_type = $page;
00092   }
00093   else{
00094    $this->page_type = $other;
00095   }
00096  }

00098  /* Theme parsing functions */
00099  public function load($file){
00100   if(!is_file($this->theme_path."views/$file.html")){
00101    $this->osimo->debug->error("OsimoTheme: unable to locate view '$file'",__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,__FILE__,true);
00102    return false;
00103   }
00104   
00105   $this->autoSetPageType($file);
00106   
00107   $this->view = $this->theme_path."views/$file.html";
00108   $this->cache_file = $this->theme_path."cache/$file.php";
00109   
00110   if($this->validate_cache()){
00111    include($this->cache_file);
00112   }
00113   else{
00114    $this->osimo->debug->error("OsimoTheme: unable to load cache file",__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,__FILE__,true);
00115   }
00116  }
00117  
00118  public function include_file($file){
00119   $this->view = $this->theme_path."includes/$file.html";
00120   $this->cache_file = $this->theme_path."cache/$file.inc.php";
00121   if($this->validate_cache()){
00122    include($this->cache_file);
00123    return true;
00124   }
00125  }
00126  
00127  private function validate_cache(){
00128   if(!is_dir($this->theme_path.'cache/')){
00129    if(!mkdir($this->theme_path.'cache/')){
00130     $this->osimo->debug->error("OsimoTheme: unable to create theme cache directory, please check folder permissions!",__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,__FILE__,true);
00131     return false;
00132    }
00133   }
00134   
00135   if(is_file($this->cache_file)){
00136    if(filemtime($this->view) > filemtime($this->cache_file)){
00137     if(!unlink($this->cache_file)){
00138      $this->osimo->debug->error("OsimoTheme: unable to regenerate cache for '".$this->view."'.",__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,__FILE__,true);
00139      return false;
00140     }
00141     
00142     return $this->cache_view();
00143    }
00144   }
00145   else{
00146    return $this->cache_view();
00147   }
00148   
00149   return true;
00150  }
00151  
00152  private function cache_view(){
00153   $view_p = fopen($this->view,'r');
00154   if(!$view_p){
00155    $this->osimo->debug->error("OsimoTheme: unable to read theme view file.",__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,__FILE__,true);
00156    return false;
00157   }
00158   
00159   $html = fread($view_p,filesize($this->view));
00160   fclose($view_p);
00161   
00162   $html = $this->parse_view($html);
00163   
00164   $cache_p = fopen($this->cache_file,'w');
00165   if(!$cache_p){
00166    $this->osimo->debug->error("OsimoTheme: unable to create cache file, check folder permissions!",__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,__FILE__,true);
00167    return false;
00168   }
00169   
00170   if(!fwrite($cache_p,$html)){
00171    $this->osimo->debug->error("OsimoTheme: unable to write to cache file",__LINE__,__FUNCTION__,__FILE__,true);
00172    return false;
00173   }
00174   
00175   fclose($cache_p);
00176   
00177   return true;
00178  }
00179  
00180  public function getClass($class){
00181   if(is_object($this->classes[$class])){
00182    return $this->classes[$class];
00183   }
00184   
00185   return false;
00186  }
00187  
00188  private function parse_view($html){
00189      $html = preg_replace(
00190       array(
00191        "/\{using ([^}]+)\}/i",
00192        "/\{include ([^}]+)\}/i",
00193        "/\{func ([A-Za-z_]+)->([^}]+)\(([^\)]*)\)\}/i",
00194        "/\{echo ([A-Za-z_]+)->([A-Za-z_]+)\}/i",
00195        "/\{var ([A-Za-z_]+)->([A-Za-z_]+)\}/i",
00196        "/\{echo (db|cache|paths|theme|debug|user)\.([A-Za-z_]+)\}/i",
00197        "/\{var (db|cache|paths|theme|debug|user)\.([A-Za-z_]+)\}/i",
00198        "/\{echo (db|cache|paths|theme|debug|user)\.([A-Za-z_]+)\(([^\)]*)\)}/i",
00199        "/\{var (db|cache|paths|theme|debug|user)\.([A-Za-z_]+)\(([^\)]*)\)}/i",
00200        "/\{echo ([^}]+)}/i",
00201        "/\{var ([^}]+)}/i",
00202        "/\{echo_const ([A-Za-z_]+)}/i",
00203        "/\{const ([A-Za-z_]+)}/i"
00204       ),
00205       array(
00206        "<? 
00207         include_once('".$this->theme_path.'models/$1.php\');
00208         get("theme")->classes["$1"] = new $1();
00209        ?>',
00210        '<? get("theme")->include_file("$1"); ?>',
00211        '<? get("theme")->classes["$1"]->$2($3); ?>',
00212        '<? echo get("theme")->classes["$1"]->$2; ?>',
00213        'get("theme")->classes["$1"]->$2',
00214        '<? echo get("$1")->$2; ?>',
00215        'get("$1")->$2',
00216        '<? echo get("$1")->$2($3); ?>',
00217        'get("$1")->$2($3)',
00218        '<? echo $$1; ?>',
00219        '$$1',
00220        '<? if(defined("$1")){ echo $1; } ?>',
00221        '$1'
00222       )
00223       ,$html);
00224      
00225      $html = preg_replace_callback("/\{foreach (category(?:\:forum)?|forum)\}/i",array($this,'parse_foreach'),$html);
00226      
00227      return $html;
00228  }
00229  
00230  private function parse_foreach($matches){
00231   if($matches[1] == 'category'){
00232    return '<? foreach(get("osimo")->category()->getAll() as $categoryID=>$category): ?>';
00233   }
00234   elseif($matches[1] == 'category:forum'){
00235    return '<? foreach(get("osimo")->forum()->';
00236   }
00237  }
00238 }
